::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus was ready for a sudden attack and rolled to the side to avoid the blasts. Rodimus then leaps at Cyclonus with all the force his legs would give him. He attempts to 'spear' aka 'football tackle' his enemy.

OOC: I assumed they were close enough to try that.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 Open skies and warm beaches are what categorize this island. It is much
 smaller than Atlantis, but many would perhaps recognize the fauna
 growing here, the feel of this place harkening one back to the days
 before Atlantis was built. 
 
 Cool winds carry fresh fragrances over sandy beaches, reaching
 delicately into gently swaying trees and brush. In the distance a tall
 majestic mountain looms, like a king surveying its kingdom. With a mix
 of browns and greens it reaches up into the skies, clouds wreathing its
 summit like a crown. 
 
 Ice blue waves brush against the large flat beach, as bright avian
 shapes dip into sun kissed ocean waters, emerging with flailing fish
 that are promptly flipped into hungry beaks. Except for the fleeting
 calls of these sea birds and the gentle lapping of the seas, all is
 silent and tranquil here .....
 
 .....
 
 .....until the sound of a powerful motor of a boat breaks the
 tranquility, and the birds flee into the skies screaming their ire at
 the intrusion. Even as the ship touches land and its passengers
 disembark, screaming horde of blue and white hunter-terminator sweep
 over the area, their passage disrupting the crystal beauty and subtle
 power of this place. In the center of this two figures, one purple and
 silver, the other blue and white hover and land nearby the boat. 
 
 As quickly as they came the hunters turn and sweep high into the air.
 
 -----------------------
 
 Cyclonus and Scourge hovered for a moment as Sweeps gathered from thier
 quick survey of the island, all satisfied there are no unseen dangers.
 They rise up and away, leaving Cyclonus and Scourge alone. 
 
 Cyclonus watched Rodimus carefully, assessing him as an opponant, even
 as Scourge�s watchful optics scanned the beach, nodding in
 satisfaction: Yes this land was level and open, perfect for a battle.
 
 With a gesture from Cyclonus, Scourge stepped back much as Remus has
 done, ready to come to the aid of his commander, but not daring to
 intervene in this battle. Above and out to sea the Sweeps now keep
 their distance as well, they are predators watching prey and yet held
 at bay by the word and will of Cyclonus.
 
 Cyclonus also is on the ground, his feet planted firmly in the
 sandiness of the beach, he stands opposite the one time Autobot
 commander, his optics continuing to glow with some internal energy. 
 
 �Now.� He says, his voice radiating a cold and pervasive confidence,
 �the battle begins! Prepare yourself� Giving Rodimus scarcely the time
 to set himself, Cyclonus raises his hand and fires a laser blast of
 searing power!
 
 The battle begins!
 
 OOC: As far as I know only Rodimus, Remus, Cyclonus and Scourge are
 here. The sweeps are here also but are flying off shore, somewhere
 between Atlantis and the island.
 
 Preston
 (Da'minion)
